attributes.action: Call for a new General Election.
attributes.additional_details: The UK is an integrated conglomerate of nations with huge diversity, ideas, ideals and an incredible history of hard-working, committed, loyal people who have made, and make this system great every day. These people should be represented as such by their chosen parliamentarians when the government becomes headless. Let us not leave most of our options out when we get the undeniable opportunity for change. The people of Great Britain are speaking through this petition.
attributes.background: David Cameron has resigned. A new Prime Minister should be elected democratically by all the people, not by the party who that resigning Prime Minister lead. Great Britain has the right to choose, address new options and vote accordingly. There should be an early Parliamentary General Election.
